
display byte variables 
num1: 	0x600258:	17
num2: 	0x600259:	9
res1: 	0x60025a:	26
res2: 	0x60025b:	8
res3: 	0x60025c:	153
res4: 	0x60025e:	1
rem4: 	0x60025f:	8

display word variables 
num3: 	0x600260:	5003
num4: 	0x600262:	7
res3: 	0x600264:	5010
res6: 	0x600266:	4996
res7: 	0x600268:	35021
res8: 	0x60026c:	714
rem8: 	0x60026e:	5

display doubleword variables 
num5: 	0x600270:	100007
num6: 	0x600274:	1501
res9: 	0x600278:	101508
res10: 	0x60027c:	98506
res11: 	0x600280:	150110507
res12: 	0x600288:	66
rem12: 	0x60028c:	941

display quadword variables 
num7: 	0x600290:	12342314
num8: 	0x600298:	14541
res13: 	0x6002a0:	12356855
res14: 	0x6002a8:	12327773
res15: 	0x6002b0:	179469587874
